title: SEO Specialist - Digital Marketing - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-05-2015 Brief Job Description: Conduct site-wide and page level audits to identify issues and ensure the site is properly constructed to maximize search engine visibility. Continually improve site structure, URL structure, page construction, content and keyword lists
